sourcesContent:
<template lang="pug">
.workExps
  h2 Work Experience
  .expItem(v-for="exp in exps")
    .companyLogo
      img(:src="`${publicPath}images/`+ exp.img", :alt="exp.img")
    .expContent
      h3.companyName {{ exp.name }}
      .expDetail
        span.expTitle {{ exp.title }} | 
        span.expDate {{ exp.date }}
      p.expDes {{ exp.description }}

</template>

<script>
export default {
  props:[
    "exps"
  ],
  data(){
    return{
      publicPath: process.env.BASE_URL
    }
  }
}
</script>

<style lang="sass" scoped>
@import '@/assets/styles/color.sass'
.workExps
  .expItem
    display: flex
    .companyLogo
      flex: 0 0 64px
      width: 64px
      height: 64px
      overflow: hidden
      border-radius: 24px
      border: 1px solid $lightGray
      box-shadow: 0 0 10px rgba(black, 0.05)
      margin-right: 24px
      img
        width: 100%
        display: block
    .expContent
      .expDetail
        font-size: 18px
        .expDate
          font-weight: 500
          color: $deepPrimary
      .expDes
        color: $gray
      h3
        font-weight: 700
        margin-top: 0
        margin-bottom: 12px
</style>
